page.title: 08The Media
page.content: Nearly every home in Chelmsley Wood owns a colour television and many own videos. People in the area gain most of their news and politics from these sources. In a survey of some people from Chelmsley Wood most people had a daily newspaper. The local paper of the area is the Evening Mail and the sports paper is the Argus. Many families buy these and obtain their everyday news from newspapers such as these. The most popular national newspapers are the Sun, Mirror and the Star. People obtain newspapers for different reasons from sports and politics to bingo. There are many newsagents in Chelmsley Wood from where local people obtain popular magazines and books such as Smash Hits and No.1. The radio is also an important means of communication.
